sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_25581eaedb4ab380fb9541a40596198c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition>current.isNewRecord()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Member Firm Field Value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	if(current.assignment_group!='423a978f373207004d0e83dcb3990ed7') // COE support group
		{
		current.u_member_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm;
		current.u_member_s_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm.getDisplayValue();
	}
	else
		{
		current.u_member_firm='0ad5349adb5e63c06d0b18df4b9619f6';
		current.u_member_s_firm='COE - Admin';
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pkhobragade</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-18 06:23:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>25581eaedb4ab380fb9541a40596198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Member Firm Field Value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_25581eaedb4ab380fb9541a40596198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lghori</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-03 09:18:01</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=25581eaedb4ab380fb9541a40596198c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_191c2f341b390450059a65b82d4bcb1c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>current.isNewRecord() || !(gs.hasRole('admin')) || !(gs.hasRole('coe_scrum_team_member'))</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Population of MF after creation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	if(!gs.hasRole('coe_scrum_team_member')){
		
		var g_sys = gs.getUser().getRecord().getValue('u_member_firm'); 
	var a_sys = gs.getUser().getRecord().getDisplayValue('u_member_firm'); 
	// Add your code here

	current.u_member_firm = g_sys;
		current.u_member_s_firm = a_sys;  
	//	gs.addInfoMessage("Hiii"+current.u_member_firm);
	} 
	

	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admsherine</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-16 11:57:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>191c2f341b390450059a65b82d4bcb1c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Population of MF after creation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_191c2f341b390450059a65b82d4bcb1c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lghori</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-03 08:51:32</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=191c2f341b390450059a65b82d4bcb1c"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition>current.isNewRecord() || !(gs.hasRole('admin'))</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">sys_class_name!=rm_defect^sys_class_name!=rm_sprint^sys_class_name!=rm_release_scrum^sys_class_name!=rm_epic^sys_class_name!=rm_story^sys_class_name!=rm_enhancement^EQ<item display_value="Defect" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_defect"/><item display_value="Sprint" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_sprint"/><item display_value="Scrum release" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_release_scrum"/><item display_value="Epic" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_epic"/><item display_value="Story" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_story"/><item display_value="Enhancement" endquery="false" field="sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="rm_enhancement"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Member Firm Field Value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	//var gf = current.addEncodedQuery('sys_class_name!=rm_defect^sys_class_name!=rm_epic^sys_class_name!=rm_sprint');
	// Add your code here
	//if(gf)
	
if(current.assignment_group!='423a978f373207004d0e83dcb3990ed7') // COE support group
	{
	current.u_member_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm;
		current.u_member_s_firm = current.opened_by.u_member_firm.getDisplayValue();
	//gs.addInfoMessage('inside');
	}
	
	else
		{
			current.u_member_firm='0ad5349adb5e63c06d0b18df4b9619f6';
			current.u_member_s_firm='COE - Admin';
		}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admsherine</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-09-25 14:34:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b43e7d261bc4c010059a65b82d4bcbae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>43</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Member Firm Field Value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b43e7d261bc4c010059a65b82d4bcbae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lghori</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-03 08:37:59</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b43e7d261bc4c010059a65b82d4bcbae"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition>current.isNewRecord()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Member Firm Field Value</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	gs.addInfoMessage('hello');
	var assgnGroup=current.assignment_group;
	if(assgnGroup!='423a978f373207004d0e83dcb3990ed7')
	current.u_member_firm = current.requested_by.u_member_firm;
	else
		current.u_member_firm='0ad5349adb5e63c06d0b18df4b9619f6';
})(current, previous);
	
	
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bavinash</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-10 11:14:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9ea1145437642700f3ac83dcb3990e92</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Member Firm Field Value</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9ea1145437642700f3ac83dcb3990e92</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lghori</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-03 08:47:14</sys_updated_on><template/><u_roles/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9ea1145437642700f3ac83dcb3990e92"/></record_update>
